meanings.definition: A person or thing that maximizes.
meanings.sent1: She is one of the maximizers in our team, always striving for the best outcomes.
meanings.sent2: The maximizers in the group focused on efficiency and productivity.
meanings.sent3: The maximizers at the party made sure everyone had a great time by organizing fun activities.
meanings.sent4: His role in the project was like that of a maximizer, ensuring every resource was used to its fullest potential.
meanings.sent5: The maximizers in the company were known for their ability to achieve great results with limited resources.
